org.divxdede.text.formatter
Class PatternFormatter.CompositeArgumentNameSpace

java.lang.Object
  org.divxdede.text.formatter.PatternFormatter.CompositeArgumentNameSpace
All Implemented Interfaces:
PatternFormatter.ArgumentNameSpace, PatternFormatter.AttributeArgumentNameSpace, PatternFormatter.DetailedArgumentNameSpace
Enclosing class:
PatternFormatter
public static class PatternFormatter.CompositeArgumentNameSpace
extends Object
implements PatternFormatter.AttributeArgumentNameSpace, PatternFormatter.DetailedArgumentNameSpace

This namespace implementation allow to compose a namespace from differents one. Each symbol's management is delegate to it's owner namespace.

This composite can't use any IndexableArgumentNameSpace because they are not designed for it with their absolute indexing feature. But AttributeArgumentNameSpace, DetailedArgumentNameSpace or standard ArgumentNameSpace can be mixed.

getDateSeparator

public String getDateSeparator(String symbol)
When an argument is a date-time, a complementary date-time conversion is required. This method return which separator must be used to separate the symbol from the date-time conversion.

Specified by:
getDateSeparator in interface PatternFormatter.ArgumentNameSpace
Returns:
date-time separator
